### Chart A

```{r}



complaints2 <- complaints %>%
  count(date_received)

fig <- plot_ly(complaints2, x = ~date_received, y = ~n, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines')
fig %>% layout(title = 'title', yaxis=list(title = 'date_received'), xaxis = list(title='n'))
fig

```
